title: Unable to login to account
description: Customer reports receiving an incorrect password error despite using the correct credentials.

title: Payment failed during checkout
description: Transaction fails at the final step with a timeout error.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer would like a dark mode option for better usability at night.

title: Email notifications not received
description: User is not receiving any ticket update emails.

title: Account suspended without reason
description: Customer claims their account was suspended unexpectedly.

title: Bug: Profile picture upload fails
description: Uploading profile image results in a server error.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load data.

title: Two-factor authentication not working
description: OTP is not delivered to the registered phone number.

title: Request for account deletion
description: Customer wants to permanently delete their account and data.

title: Unable to download reports
description: Export button does not respond when clicked.

title: Password reset email expired
description: Reset link expires immediately after being sent.

title: UI alignment issue on mobile
description: Buttons overlap on smaller screen sizes.

title: Data not syncing in real time
description: Live updates are delayed across devices.

title: Support chat disconnects frequently
description: Chat session disconnects after a few minutes.
